name: Niedner
tag_list: fire-hose, fire-fighting-equipment, discharge-hose, hose-manufacturer, industrial-hose, layflat-hose, custom-hose, fire-fighting-hose, fire-hose-testing, tuyau-dincendie, mangueras-contra-incendios, large-diameter-hose
overview:
Niedner, a wholly-owned subsidiary of Sanexen Environmental Services Inc., traces its origin back to 1895. The company offers a wide range of high quality, lightweight, extremely flexible, compact, resistant large diameter hoses, (12+ inches).

Its products are sold to the following markets

  • Forestry
  • Municipal
  • Industrial
  • Government
  • Automotive
  • Oil & Gas
  • Snowmaking markets around the world.

Niednerâ€™s ongoing commitment of new product development and innovative manufacturing methods has made it a world leader in the hose industry. As a fire fighting equipment and fire hose manufacturer, Niedner is proud to help people saves lives.
